sentences.sContent: Objective: To study the possibility of the amnion as hyaline cartilage cells scaffold in tissue - engineering.
sentences.sContent_eng: Objective: To study the possibility of the amnion as hyaline cartilage cells scaffold in tissue - engineering.
sentences.sCn: 目的：研究羊膜作为透明软骨细胞组织工程支架材料的可行性。

sentences.sContent: RESULTS:The defects could be repaired completely with hyaline like cartilage at 12 weeks in the diabetes and health groups, while the control group was filled with fibrous tissue.
sentences.sContent_eng: RESULTS:The defects could be repaired completely with hyaline like cartilage at 12 weeks in the diabetes and health groups, while the control group was filled with fibrous tissue.
sentences.sCn: 结果：大体观察糖尿病兔和健康兔骨膜移植组在第12周时均能以类透明软骨组织修复缺损，而对照组为纤维肉芽组织。

trans.tranOther: clear and translucent, with no fibres or granules
